title: [BUG] Package 'SkiaSharp.Views.WPF 3.119.0' was restored using '.NETFramework...
body:
### Description

I'm upgrading a project from 2.88.9 to 3.119 and I am getting these build warnings:

```
warning NU1701: Package 'OpenTK 3.3.1' was restored using '.NETFramework,Version=v4.6.1, .NETFramework,Version=v4.6.2, .NETFramework,Version=v4.7, .NETFramework,Version=v4.7.1, .NETFramework,Version=v4.7.2, .NETFramework,Version=v4.8, .NETFramework,Version=v4.8.1' instead of the project target framework 'net8.0-windows7.0'. This package may not be fully compatible with your project.
warning NU1701: Package 'OpenTK.GLWpfControl 3.3.0' was restored using '.NETFramework,Version=v4.6.1, .NETFramework,Version=v4.6.2, .NETFramework,Version=v4.7, .NETFramework,Version=v4.7.1, .NETFramework,Version=v4.7.2, .NETFramework,Version=v4.8, .NETFramework,Version=v4.8.1' instead of the project target framework 'net8.0-windows7.0'. This package may not be fully compatible with your project.
warning NU1701: Package 'SkiaSharp.Views.WPF 3.119.0' was restored using '.NETFramework,Version=v4.6.1, .NETFramework,Version=v4.6.2, .NETFramework,Version=v4.7, .NETFramework,Version=v4.7.1, .NETFramework,Version=v4.7.2, .NETFramework,Version=v4.8, .NETFramework,Version=v4.8.1' instead of the project target framework 'net8.0-windows7.0'. This package may not be fully compatible with your project.
```

It seems to be related to #1803 , but the comments in the issue suggest that a fix was merged and also WPF should not have this issue.

Besides the warnings, the application seems to be working properly.

### Code
